title: TikTok tests “Watch History” to help you monitor all the hilarious clips you’ve seen
content:
Plenty of people enjoy spending their free time on TikTok. The platform offers bite-sized clips revolving around various topics and interests. Whether you’re looking for tutorials, informative facts, totally-not-staged pranks, or hilarious content, you will likely find a match. One of the annoyances of this platform, though, is the inability to track the clips you’ve

The post TikTok tests “Watch History” to help you monitor all the hilarious clips you’ve seen appeared first on xda-developers.
description: TikTok is testing a new "Watch History" feature to help users keep tabs on all of the clips they've watched in the past seven days.
